biotools.summary: Algorithm that performs cotranscriptional folding of RNAs, starting at a user a specified structure (default: open chain) and ending at the minimum free energy structure. Folding events are performed between transcription of additional bases and are regulated by barrier heights between the source and target structure.

bioschemas.name: Kinwalker
bioschemas.summary: Algorithm that performs cotranscriptional folding of RNAs, starting at a user a specified structure (default: open chain) and ending at the minimum free energy structure. Folding events are performed between transcription of additional bases and are regulated by barrier heights between the source and target structure.
